name: israeli-bank-scrapers
description: Provide scrapers for all major Israeli banks and credit card companies

scripts.test:ci: cp tests/.tests-config.tpl.js tests/.tests-config.js && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.prepare:core: node utils/prepare-israeli-bank-scrapers-core.js && npm i --package-lock-only && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.publish:core: npm run prepare:core && npm publish --access public && npm run reset
scripts.publish:default: npm run prepare:default && npm test && npm publish --access public && npm run reset
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:default && npm run publish:core

author: Elad Shaham
